reviewText: Love the 3 movies, but was extremely dissatisfied with the fact that 'The Juror' is 4:3 aspect ratio when on-line specs say it's 2.35:1, & packaging says it's 2.35:1. 'Mortal Thoughts' is also 4:3 AR, but at least it's advertised that way.
I got all 3 movies for less than The Seventh Sign cost. Great used deal.
Only Juror was good the others OMG ... I did not know she did such trash!
Very exciting, kept me on edge during the entire movie wondering how it would end!
